mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members (member_id, name, nickname, password, role, created_at) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{password}, #{role}, now());
mapper.select: SELECT member_id AS memberId, name, nickname, profile_img AS profileImg, role FROM members WHERE member_id = #{memberId};
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM members WHERE member_id = #{memberId}) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END;
